instructions.name: ADD
instructions.description: Adds two registers and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: ADDI
instructions.description: Adds a register and a sign-extended immediate value and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: ADDIU
instructions.description: Adds a register and a sign-extended immediate value and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: ADDU
instructions.description: Adds two registers and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: AND
instructions.description: Bitwise ands two registers and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: ANDI
instructions.description: Bitwise ands a register and an immediate value and stores the result in a register

instructions.name: BEQ
instructions.description: Branches if the two registers are equal

instructions.name: BGE
instructions.full_name: Branch on greater than or equal to zero and link
instructions.description: Branches if the register is greater than or equal to zero and saves the return address in $31
instructions.operation: if $s >= 0 $31 = PC + 8 (or nPC + 4); advance_pc (offset << 2)); else advance_pc (4);

instructions.name: BGT
instructions.description: Branches if the register is greater than zero

instructions.name: BLE
instructions.full_name: Branch on less than or equal to zero
instructions.description: Branches if the register is less than or equal to zero

instructions.name: BLT
instructions.description: Branches if the register is less than zero

instructions.name: BLTZAL
instructions.full_name: Branch on less than zero and link
instructions.description: Branches if the register is less than zero and saves the return address in $31
instructions.operation: if $s < 0 $31 = PC + 8 (or nPC + 4); advance_pc (offset << 2)); else advance_pc (4);

instructions.name: BNE
instructions.description: Branches if the two registers are not equal

instructions.name: DIV
instructions.description: Divides $s by $t and stores the quotient in $LO and the remainder in $HI

instructions.name: DIVU
instructions.description: Divides $s by $t and stores the quotient in $LO and the remainder in $HI

instructions.name: J
instructions.description: Jumps to the calculated address

instructions.name: JAL
instructions.description: Jumps to the calculated address and stores the return address in $31

instructions.name: JR
instructions.description: Jump to the address contained in register $s

instructions.name: LB
instructions.description: A byte is loaded into a register from the specified address.

instructions.name: LI
instructions.description: The immediate value stored in the register

instructions.name: LUI
instructions.description: The immediate value is shifted left 16 bits and stored in the register. The lower 16 bits are zeroes

instructions.name: LW
instructions.description: A word is loaded into a register from the specified address.

instructions.name: LA
instructions.description: An address is loaded into a register

instructions.name: SYSCALL
instructions.description: Call operating system to perform action from $a0 with operand $v0
